programme.title: The Beast Must Die
programme.desc: Eight people have been invited to an island estate for the weekend. One of them is a werewolf. Can you guess which one?

programme.title: Class of 1984
programme.desc: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school soon ends up clashing with the delinquent leader of a punk posse that runs the school.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
programme.desc: Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Communion
programme.desc: Whitley Streiber's harrowing tale of his alien abduction

programme.title: Deathcember
programme.desc: A collection of 24 films that take a look at the dark side of the festive season from international directors with the most diverse ideas and styles.

programme.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night: Part 2
programme.desc: The now-adult Ricky talks to a psychiatrist about how he became a murderer after his brother, Billy, died, which leads back to Mother Superior.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.
